title: East India Cotton association Prices - October 23 2019

East India Cotton association Prices - October 23 2019

Commodities 57 minutes ago (Oct 23, 2019 20:42)

© Reuters. East India Cotton association Prices - October 23 2019 BANGALORE, October 23(Reuters) - The following are the daily Cotton prices supplied by Indian based East India Cotton Association. The prices are in Indian Rupees per Candy (355.62 Kgs).
